# init(text:detailText:)

**Initializer**

Creates a list item with primary and secondary text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(text: String?, detailText: String?)
```

## Parameters

- **text**: The primary text to show in the list item cell.
- **detailText**: Additional text to display below the primary text in the list item cell.

## Return Value

A newly initialized list item.

## Creating a List Item

- **init(text:detailText:image:)**: Creates a list item with primary text, secondary text, and an image.
- **init(text:detailText:image:accessoryImage:accessoryType:)**: Creates a list item that displays an accessory beside its content.

items.description: Creates a list item with primary text, secondary text, and an image.
